examples.title: Dialog
examples.code:
import {
  Command,
  CommandDialog,
  CommandEmpty,
  CommandGroup,
  CommandInput,
  CommandItem,
  CommandList,
  CommandSeparator,
  CommandShortcut,
} from "@/components/ui/command"

examples.title: Dialog
examples.code:
<Command>
  <CommandInput placeholder="Type a command or search..." />
  <CommandList>
    <CommandEmpty>No results found.</CommandEmpty>
    <CommandGroup heading="Suggestions">
      <CommandItem>Calendar</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem>Search Emoji</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem>Calculator</CommandItem>
    </CommandGroup>
    <CommandSeparator />
    <CommandGroup heading="Settings">
      <CommandItem>Profile</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem>Billing</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem>Settings</CommandItem>
    </CommandGroup>
  </CommandList>
</Command>

examples.title: Example 5
examples.code:
"use client" import * as React from "react" import { Calculator, Calendar, CreditCard, Settings, Smile, User, } from "lucide-react" import { CommandDialog, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList, CommandSeparator, CommandShortcut, } from "@/components/ui/command" export function CommandDialogDemo() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) React.useEffect(() => { const down = (e: KeyboardEvent) => { if (e.key === "j" && (e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey)) { e.preventDefault() setOpen((open) => !open) } } document.addEventListener("keydown", down) return () => document.removeEventListener("keydown", down) }, []) return ( <>

Press{" "} ⌘J

No results found. Calendar Search Emoji Calculator Profile ⌘P Billing ⌘B Settings ⌘S ) }
